text: Bed and Sofa () is a 1927 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Abram Room.В Москве завершился I Московский международный фестиваль архивных фильмовСостоялась мировая премьера «Рождественского поста» Сергея Ахунова It stars Nikolai Batalov, Lyudmila Semyonova, and Vladimir Fogel. ==Actors== *Nikolai Batalov as Kolia, the husband *Lyudmila Semyonova as Liuda, the wife *Vladimir Fogel as Volodia, the friend *Leonid Yurenyov as The Porter *Yelena Sokolova as The Nurse == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1927 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Movies directed by Abram Room
title: Bed and Sofa
